appliedepi 0.1.0

Reference

All functions

annotate_and_save()

CpG annotate and save csv files

assignGroup()

Add KEGG superpathways to the pathways enriched from the PEA analysis Run pathway_list before using this function or will result in errors

bind_mwas_res_from_folder()

This function will bind rows across the csv files in a given target folder

bkmr_cohort()

BKMR wrapper performing cohort specific loops. Load Matrix and bindrcpp packages

bkmr_sex()

BKMR wrapper performing sex specific loops. Load Matrix and bindrcpp packages

calculatePvalCutoff()

Manually get p-value cutoffs based on the 500 features with lowest p-values use along with the runMummichog function

combine_csv_files()

Combines mummuchog output files into a single dataframe

enrichment_summary()

ewas enrichemnt summary

ewas_loop_pll()

Performs EWAS using CpGassoc library. Allows flexibility to loop for multiple exposure variables and methylation data from multiple tissues.

ewas_summary()

Summarize results from EWAS analysis

extract_data_from_folder()

Extract results from the bkmr RDA files

extract_pips()

Extract bkmr PIPs from all RDA files - prep for Shiny object

extract_weights()

Extract chemical weights contributed to the joint association using non bootstrap quantile g-computation.

get_gcomp_estimates()

Extract results from the qgcomp output RDA files. Iterates though the RDA files and compiles results in tibble format

lm_func()

Multiple linear regression wrapper function that will take a list of exposure and outcome variables. Returns a matrix of results between each combination

match_sequence()

match sequence - validation step before getting into MWAS loop match the exposure dataset with the metabolome sequence metabolome each observation is a feature and each variable is a subject Whereas the exposure/covariate dataset each observation is a subject

missing_data_summary()

Missing data summary, prints frequency and count

mwas_lm_loop()

mwas loop - perform linear regression between each feature and exposure metric provided in the input metabolome data will be transposed in the function input metabolome features and exposures are in different dataframes runtime 17,000 * 70 * 17 matrix takes around 10 mins

perform_gene_enrichment()

Gene enrichment for EWAS files

print_version_info()

Prints detailed summary of the R environment including dependencies

process_methylation_data()

Process methylation data using minfi pipeline. This function will drop samples with GT 5 percent high detection p-values, probes with at least one high detection p-value, Sex chromosomes, loci associated with single-nucleotide polymorphisms and cross-hybridizing probes. Additionally, will preprocess using Noob for background correction and dye bias normalization, BMIQ for probe design bias, batch correction using ComBat.

qgcomp_func()

Quantile g-computation wrapper function to automate analysis for multiple outcomes. Additionally, allows flexibility to perform stratified analysis.

runMummichog()

Performs Pathway Enrichment Analysis (PEA) using mummichog function available from metaboAnalystR library This function also prints the p-value theshold on scree that is being used for the analysis

split_and_export()

Split MWAS LM result files from a single dataframe to .txt files for PEA mummichog

summarize_variables()

Summarize categorical and continuous variables

var_selec()

Variable selection using group LASSO (gglasso, grpreg that use distinct mathematical approaches), sparse group LASSO, glmnet, stability selection with error control
